DCC
IP

Files

file  dcc.h
 This file contains the prototypes of the APIs present in the device abstraction layer file of DCC. This also contains some related macros.

Macros

#define DCC_SRC0_COUNT_MAX   (0xFFFFFU)
 Macro defines maximum value of count for clock source 0.
 
#define DCC_SRC0_VALID_MAX   (0x0FFFFU)
 Macro defines maximum value of valid count for clock source 0.
 
#define DCC_SRC1_COUNT_MAX   (0xFFFFFU)
 Macro defines maximum value of count for clock source 1.

Detailed Description

Typedef Documentation

typedef enum dccOperationMode dccOperationMode_t

Enum to select the DCC Operation Mode.

DCC can either operate in single shot or continuous mode.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum dccClkSrc0

Enum to select the COUNT0 clock source.

Enumerator
DCC_CLK_SRC0_SYS_CLK1 

SYS_CLK1 is selected as source for COUNT0

DCC_CLK_SRC0_SYS_CLK2 

SYS_CLK2 is selected as source for COUNT0

DCC_CLK_SRC0_XREF_CLK 

XREF_CLK is selected as source for COUNT0

enum dccIntrType

Enum for DCC interrupts.

Enumerator
DCC_INTERRUPTS_ERROR 

The error signal

DCC_INTERRUPTS_DONE 

Done interrupt signal

enum dccOperationMode

Enum to select the DCC Operation Mode.

DCC can either operate in single shot or continuous mode.

Enumerator
DCC_OPERATION_MODE_SINGLE_SHOT1 

Stop counting when counter0 and valid0 both reach zero

DCC_OPERATION_MODE_SINGLE_SHOT2 

Stop counting when counter1 reaches zero

DCC_OPERATION_MODE_CONTINUOUS 

Continuously repeat (until error)

Function Documentation

void DCCClearIntrStatus ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  intrMask 
)

This API is used to clear interrupt status.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the DCC Registers.
intrMaskInterrupts to clear status. Refer enum dccIntrType_t.
Returns
None

uint32_t  intrType 
)

This API is used to disable interrupts.

Parameters

intrTypeInterrupts to disable. Refer enum dccInterrupts_t.
Returns
status Configuration status.
void DCCEnable ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  enable 
)

This API is used to configure DCC module.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the DCC Registers.
enableDCC is enabled if it is TRUE. DCC is disabled if it is FALSE.
Returns
None

uint32_t  intrType 
)

This API is used to enable interrupts.

Parameters

intrTypeInterrupts to enable. Refer enum dccIntrType_t.
Returns

void DCCGetRevisionId ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
dccRevisionId_t *  revId 
)

This API is used get the DCC revision ID.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the DCC Registers.
revIdContains Revision ID of DCC module. Refer struct dccRevisionId_t.
Returns
None.
int32_t DCCSetConfig ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
const dccConfigParams_t *  configParams 
)

This API is used to configure DCC module.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the DCC Registers.
configParamsDCC configuration parameters. Refer enum dccConfigParams_t.
Returns
status Configuration status. NOTE: If the value of 'seedValid0' is less then 4 then it will programmed as 4. Since minimum programmable value of the 'seedValid0' is 4.
